alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:56AM CDT until May 30 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Holt County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1056 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chambers, or 21 miles southwest of O`neill, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`neill, O`Neill, Atkinson, Chambers, Amelia, Emmet, Midway and Scottville. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 284 and 312. Highway 281 between mile markers 168 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
